[set page_title]Prepare to Launch[/set] [set ui_checklist]1[/set] @_UI_STD_HEAD_@ [table-editor table=variable left_width=120 table_width=500 wizard=1 defaults=1 bottom_buttons=1 next_text=Launch no_top=1 no_bottom=1 row_template="[scratch row_template]" ui_profile="*launch" mv_nextpage=__UI_BASE__/wizard/do_launch mv_prevpage=__UI_BASE__/index hidden.ui_return_to="__UI_BASE__/index" ui_data_key=code default.code="[value code]" widget.code=text_10 ui_data_fields="code nukeorders nukeusers orderstart enablesecure" ui_display_only="nukeorders nukeusers orderstart enablesecure" ui_hide_key=1 label.nukeorders="Delete sample order data" help.nukeorders="Select Yes if you wish to start with an empty order database" widget.nukeorders=yesno default.nukeusers=1 label.nukeusers="Delete sample user data" help.nukeusers="Select Yes if you wish to start with an empty customer database" widget.nukeusers=yesno default.nukeusers=1 label.orderstart="Starting order number" help.orderstart="First order number -- only letters/digits" widget.orderstart=text_8 filter.orderstart=alphanumeric default.orderstart=01000 label.enablesecure="Enable Secure (SSL)" help.enablesecure="Select Yes if your Stronghold secure server is set up" override.enablesecure=1 widget.enablesecure=select passed.enablesecure="0=No, 1=Yes" ]

When you press Launch, the following will occur:

  • The order database will be emptied of all orders unless you select No above
  • The user database will be emptied of all customer records unless you select No above
  • The order number will be reset
  • The secure web server should be enabled. If you don't accept credit cards, this is optional.

At that point you may begin testing by following the Preview link, and changing the configuration with Interchange's administration tool.

After you are satisfied with your catalog, you can launch and begin taking orders.

@_UI_STD_FOOTER_@
